column2: ann_colors <- list(treatment= c(amb="cadetblue3", l="palevioletred", xl="indianred3")) #color-blind friendly
matpln <- matpln - rowMeans(matpln) #difference in expression compared to average across all samples
pln_DEGheatmap <- pheatmap(matpln, scale= "row", annotation_col=df_pln, annotation_colors = ann_colors,
